# Problem 1

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")

numaisle_df = 
  instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  count(aisle, name = "n_obs")

numaisle1_df = 
  numaisle_df %>% 
  filter(n_obs > 10000) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = aisle, y = n_obs)) +
  geom_point() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.4, hjust = 1))

popitem_df = 
  instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(product_name, aisle)
```
